Promo cards, anyone recall which came in what magazines?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Farm and Monster Rancher Cards: Monster Rancher CCG (Artbox, 2000): General Q&A: Promo cards, anyone recall which came in what magazines?
By Lisa Shock on Friday, February 22, 2008 - 04:14 pm:

The six promo cards were packed in with magazines. Each card only came in a specific magazine, it wasn't random.

I am wondering if anyone recalls which card was packed with what magazine, and if anyone recalls what the magazines were. I can only recall two: ToyFare and Inquest.
